channel.title: Blog on Home

item.title: How I Built THIS Website
item.description: Several people have asked for the resources I used to create this website. I’m writing this so I can just send a link when responding to any future requests. The three main criteria I used when choosing what tools to use: Quick & easy enough to learn that I could have a basic site up and running within a day or two and add/update content without too much effort.
